system.description:
Spells marked with @ICON[offensive] are offensive spells and require Magic Checks!

SpellMPTargetDuration
@UUID[Compendium.fabula-ultima-homebrew.homebrew-skills.Item.cFV3ZV1Q46c7CXGP]{Earthworks}10 × TUp to three creaturesScene

Trenches collapse and barriers spring up to protect your allies. Your targets cannot be targeted by ranged attacks. Any creature that targets them with a melee attack is considered to be in the trenches. The effect of this spell on a target ends when they make a melee attack against a creature that isn’t in the trenches or otherwise leave its protection (such as by taking flight.)

SpellMPTargetDuration
@UUID[Compendium.fabula-ultima-homebrew.homebrew-skills.Item.vC5QqfeGdPlnkbTM]{Eruption} @ICON[offensive]10 × TUp to three creaturesInstantaneous

Magma surges, flinging boulders high into the air. Each non-flying target hit by this spell suffers 【HR + 15】 fire damage, and each flying target hit suffers 【HR + 15】earth damage.

Opportunity: Each target hit by this spell suffers shaken.

SpellMPTargetDuration
@UUID[Compendium.fabula-ultima-homebrew.homebrew-skills.Item.9swh7L3Y2UU5pjgZ]{Graviton} @ICON[offensive]20One creatureInstantaneous

The Earth beckons your foe into its embrace. The target suffers 【HR + 25】 earth damage. A flying target lands immediately and can’t take off in their next turn.
Damage dealt by this spell ignores resistances.

SpellMPTargetDuration
@UUID[Compendium.fabula-ultima-homebrew.homebrew-skills.Item.U6McsdYqONntZv2z]{Megathrust}20SpecialInstantaneous

Each creature on the scene that isn’t flying, floating, falling, or otherwise in mid-air takes 30 earth damage. Creatures that are being protected by the Solid Path Skill have resistance to this damage.

SpellMPTargetDuration
@UUID[Compendium.fabula-ultima-homebrew.homebrew-skills.Item.QTrPePb0dj1XsEjY]{Might of Antaeus}20One creatureScene

The strength of the earth itself surges through your ally. Until this spell ends, the target treats their Might and Willpower attributes as one die size higher (up to a maximum of d12) and is immune to weak and shaken as long as they are standing on solid ground. They lose the benefit in mid-air, on a platform, or on the deck of a ship, but regain it if they reach the ground again during this scene.

Note: in practical terms, this means there are encounters you just won’t be able to use it in.

SpellMPTargetDuration
@UUID[Compendium.fabula-ultima-homebrew.homebrew-skills.Item.Ku6JY3pnpIgosp6F]{Quicksand} @ICON[offensive]5 × TUp to five creaturesInstantaneous

The ground turns into thick, clinging muck beneath your foes. Each target hit by this spell suffers 【HR + 5】 earth damage and slow. This spell cannot target creatures who are flying, floating, falling, or otherwise in mid-air.

Opportunity: Choose one target hit by this spell. They perform one fewer action on their next turn (to a minimum of 0 actions.)

SpellMPTargetDuration
@UUID[Compendium.fabula-ultima-homebrew.homebrew-skills.Item.fRHu2rB55q3CVjvo]{Orogeny}10One creatureInstantaneous

Your target is lifted by a spire of rock. Until they voluntarily slide down, they can only be reached in melee by b creatures, and likewise can only use melee attacks against flying creatures. If there is a ceiling (e.g. in a cavern underground), this spell instead functions as Terra, except it can still only target one creature.

Spell

MP

Target

Duration

@UUID[Compendium.fabula-ultima-homebrew.homebrew-skills.Item.OSZAM1ickQ18fwaR]{Permafrost} @ICON[offensive]

10 × T

Up to three creatures

Instantaneous

Ice permeates the earth and steals the enemy’s vital warmth. Each target hit by this spell suffers 【HR + 15】 ice damage and can’t burrow or emerge from the earth during their next turn. This spell can target creatures who are otherwise protected underground, but cannot target creatures who are flying, floating, falling, or otherwise in mid-air.

Opportunity: Each target hit by this spell suffers weak.

SpellMPTargetDuration
@UUID[Compendium.fabula-ultima-homebrew.homebrew-skills.Item.0vz1FvwW8lVhAEBX]{Stone's Throw}10SelfScene

Better rock tossing through magic! You create three Perfect Stones as the following one-handed thrown weapon - It is limited (3)

@UUID[Compendium.fabula-ultima-homebrew.homebrew-skills.Item.Wo9LDqTbd4jGLsi6]{Perfect Stones}

【MIG + DEX】 or 【INS + WLP】

【HR + 10】Earth

Opportunity: Each target hit suffers dazed.

If you have a free hand slot as you cast this spell, you may equip the Perfect Stones to it and make a free attack with one as part of the same action. When you’ve attacked with your third Perfect Stone, the effects of the spell end.

SpellMPTargetDuration
@UUID[Compendium.fabula-ultima-homebrew.homebrew-skills.Item.f1HiZ8TyxsVraBvk]{Terra} @ICON[offensive]10 × TUp to three creatures Instantaneous

Spires of jagged rock erupt from the ground beneath your foes, closing around them.
Each target hit by this spell suffers 【HR + 15】 earth damage. This spell cannot target creatures who are flying, floating, falling, or otherwise in mid-air.
Opportunity: Each target hit by this spell performs one fewer action on their next turn
(to a minimum of 0 actions).

SpellMPTargetDuration
@UUID[Compendium.fabula-ultima-homebrew.homebrew-skills.Item.DXXiguRUl49GZhA0]{Tremor} @ICON[offensive]5 × TUp to five creaturesInstantaneous

You delicately pluck at the earth so that the damage doesn’t spread beyond your target. Each target hit by this spell suffers 【HR + 10】 earth damage. This spell cannot target creatures who are flying, floating, falling, or otherwise in mid-air.

Opportunity: On your next turn, you may cast Aftershock on all of the same targets who are still eligible, either before or after your action. It’s a copy of Tremor that doesn’t use your action and doesn’t have this Opportunity.

Spell

MP

Target

Duration

@UUID[Compendium.fabula-ultima-homebrew.homebrew-skills.Item.RFNn56eRQQAY4gyV]{Vulcan's Vent} @ICON[offensive]

15 × T

Up to three creatures

Instantaneous

The earth splits and noxious fumes spill forth. Each target hit by this spell suffers 【HR + 15】 poison damage. Your targets’ magic defense is set to their dexterity die against this spell.

Opportunity: Each target hit by this spell suffers poisoned.
